response.original_title: The Diver: Blocked, blurred and in the dark
response.overview: This is an animated documentary series about people who want to tell their story, but can't or won't do it openly because they need to remain anonymous. The diver works for the Dutch law enforcement system. He cannot disclose his identity in order to preserve the safety of himself and his team. His work seems exciting to us, but he tells dangerous stories calmly and modestly.
response.title: The Diver: Blocked, blurred and in the dark
